summary: Diff implements custom-domain validation that accepts dotted FQDNs, adds runtime logo fallbacks, and reinforces hash-based routing with a NotFound route plus a deployment guide. However, a true "live deployment URL" cannot be verified from code changes alone, and new user-facing Hindi text/new 404 page appear outside the request constraints/non-goals.

From the diff summary alone, post-deployment behavior cannot be confirmed.
